content:
I'm using an R4 hapi server... If I perform a search for
/baseR4/ImplementationGuide?resource=StructureDefinition/XXX
I get an error stating that "resource" is not a valid parameter.
However, this is a parameter listed in in the base StructureDefinition spec...
Is this just not implemented yet??
Should have titled the topic "ImplementationGuide search for..."
